$SNOW lot of fear out there so let me break down some simple math for you. $snow is guiding for $10B of revenue by 2028. At the pace they are growing, they will blow past that. Let's conservatively assume $15B. Then assume a 20% FCF margin (they are already up to 15%). That implies $3B of FCF in 2028. Now use a 50x FCF multiple (versus 35x for $msft, which grows at half the rate), that gets you to $150b market cap versus $50B today.  3x return in 6 years.
